CustomField.description: This field represents the unique ID of the person from the Engagio Activities data. If there is no PersonID, the value of "First Name-Last Name-Title" will be used instead.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field represents the unique ID of the person from the Engagio Activities data. If there is no PersonID, the value of "First Name-Last Name-Title" will be used instead.
CustomField.label: Person ID
